welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Kidlington, UK! Explore our quaint town known for its beautiful countryside and historical sites. We invite you to immerse yourself in our local culture and enjoy all that Kidlington has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oxford (Kidlington) Airport handles all commercial flights and has a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Oxford (Kidlington) Airport is reserved for private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Raf Brize Norton Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Raf Brize Norton Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Benson Airport is primarily used by the RAF.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
